attributes.action: establish a website which forces ministers to make all new policy proposals online, allowing for open public debate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All we want is a truly democratic society, in which every single member of the public has an equal say on what is done in their name. Is the government here to empower the people, or are the people here to empower the government?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
